name: BEYOND (itch) (Awasete)
description:
You escape into your dreams. Into a world beyond your imagination.

Struggle and fight with your own hands.
Decide how to swing your sword, parry incoming projectiles, and precisely aim magic spells.

Wield the weapons pried from the hands of your enemies.

And defeat foe after foe until your reach the end of your journey.

Programming and Art: Me
Music: Me / AZALI



Note #1:
After playing the game, please fill out this quick multiple-choice survey, your feedback helps to make the game better!
CLICK HERE



CONTROLS:
WASD + SPACE       [Movement]
Q                  [Recover Mana]
E                  [Interact]
R                  [Charge Magic]
I                  [Inventory]
ESCAPE             [Pause Menu]
SHIFT              [Dash]
LEFT/RIGHT CLICK   [Attack]
1-9 / SCROLL WHEEL [Weapon Select]



Note #2:
File is currently just a level 1 demo.
